text: 🚨Gaza: Infection prevention and control & water, sanitation and hygiene measures in healthcare settings and shelters are crucial! 💦🧽🚽 Overcrowding, inadequate facilities, and a dysfunctional health system pose significant risks. Let's work together to ensure access to safe water, sanitation, hand hygiene, IPC supplies, and appropriate PPE use based on risk assessment. 💪🏽
